fields.name: PWC India
fields.about: PricewaterhouseCoopers International Limited is a British multinational professional services brand of firms, operating as partnerships under the PwC brand. It is the second-largest professional services network in the world and is considered one of the Big Four accounting firms, along with Deloitte, EY and KPMG.

fields.name: HackTheBox
fields.about: Hack The Box is a leading gamified cybersecurity upskilling, certification, and talent assessment software platform enabling individuals, businesses, government institutions, and universities to sharpen their offensive and defensive security expertise.

fields.name: Miracle software systems
fields.about: Miracle Software Systems, Inc. is a 25 year firm headquartered in Novi ,MI ,USA. Miracle has been a leader in the IT space

fields.name: Deloitte
fields.about: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited, commonly referred to as Deloitte, is a British multinational professional services network headquartered in London, England

fields.name: KPMG International
fields.about: KPMG International Limited is a multinational professional services network, and one of the Big Four accounting organizations, along with Ernst & Young, Deloitte, and PwC. The name "KPMG" stands for "Klynveld Peat Marwick Goerdeler"

fields.name: Infosys
fields.about: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming.

fields.name: Accenture
fields.about: Accenture plc is an Irish-American professional services company based in Dublin, specializing in information technology services and consulting. A Fortune Global 500 company, it reported revenues of $61.6 billion in 2022

fields.name: Amazon
fields.about: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming.

fields.name: Natwest
fields.about: National Westminster Bank, commonly known as NatWest, is a major retail and commercial bank in the United Kingdom based in London, England. It was established in 1968 by the merger of National Provincial Bank and Westminster Bank
